title: OLED panel fabrication : U.S. cost targets 2016 to 2025
summary: Overall Cost target in USD per square meter has decreased over the Year.
Cost target in USD per square meter is slightly decreasing from 2020 to 2025.
The highest Cost target in USD per square meter, of value 10.0 was reached at Year 2020
Minimum Cost target in USD per square meter about 5.0 was reached at Year 2025
